titles.title: Assuring Quality Care for Veterans Act
To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the continuing professional education reimbursement provided to health professionals employed by the Department of Veterans Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
9/17/2014--Introduced. Assuring Quality Care for Veterans Act - Authorizes (current law requires) the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) to reimburse any full-time board-certified health professional (under current law, physician or dentist) appointed to the VA for continuing professional education expenses incurred, up to $1,600 per year (under current law, $1,000).
Directs that the expenses incurred be expenses required to maintain licensure.
